faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Get Answers to Your Questions About RoboNeo

item-1.question: Is RoboNeo free to use?
item-1.answer: Newly registered users receive a one-time grant of 10 credits, which can be spent on creating watermark-free, high-resolution images or stickers. After exhausting the free credits, you can either purchase pay-as-you-go credits or upgrade to a Pro / Ultimate subscription for higher quotas and additional features.

item-2.question: Can I use the images or stickers for commercial projects?
item-2.answer: Absolutely. All content created with any paid plan or credit pack is yours to use commercially‚Äîsocial media, print, merchandising, you name it. Free-tier images are for personal, non-commercial use only.

item-3.question: Will my uploaded photos be used to train the AI?
item-3.answer: No. Your images are never used to train our models or shared with third parties.

item-4.question: What file formats are supported?
item-4.answer: Input: JPEG and PNG (‚â§ 4 MB). Output: Transparent PNG (stickers default to 512 √ó 512 px; higher resolutions available on paid plans)

item-5.question: How fast is the generation process?
item-5.answer: Most images finish in around 1 minute. Paid users get priority queues and faster speeds, even during peak times.

item-6.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
item-6.answer: Yes. Pause or cancel with one click in your account dashboard; 7-day money-back guarantee on all new subscriptions.

item-7.question: Is payment secure, and what methods do you accept?
item-7.answer: All transactions are protected with 256-bit SSL encryption. We accept Visa, Mastercard, and American Express, and we never store your full payment details.

item-8.question: How can I get support or suggest new features?
item-8.answer: Email support@roboneo.art. We usually reply within 24 hours and love hearing your ideas!

item-1.name: Sarah Chen
item-1.quote: RoboNeo transformed my social media game! I can turn any photo into amazing stickers in seconds. My followers love the iOS style stickers I create from our group photos.

item-2.name: Mike Rodriguez
item-2.quote: Game changer for my product listings! I use RoboNeo to create clean, professional product stickers without backgrounds. Sales have increased 40% since I started using it.

item-3.name: Emma Thompson
item-3.quote: Our team saves hours every week with RoboNeo. We can quickly create branded stickers and graphics for campaigns. The LEGO style is perfect for our playful brand.

item-4.name: David Kim
item-4.quote: As a designer, I'm impressed by the quality. RoboNeo's AI produces results that would take me hours in Photoshop. It's now an essential tool in my workflow.

item-5.name: Jessica Park
item-5.quote: My engagement skyrocketed after I started using RoboNeo stickers in my stories! The Snoopy style is so cute and unique. My audience always asks how I make them.

item-6.name: Alex Turner
item-6.quote: No design skills? No problem! RoboNeo made it possible for me to create professional marketing materials for my caf√©. The quality is incredible and it's so easy to use.
